meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dorothy Craig Ron Karr Bob Beers Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #842.

div.div: Missing introduction and first 10 clues of the Jeopardy! round.

td.p: Dorothy Craig, a nurse educator from Scranton, Pennsylvania
Ron Karr, a card counter from Mountain View, California
Bob Beers, an attorney from Fairfax, Virginia

tr.td: FLAGS
FICTIONAL CHARACTERS
COUNTRY CROONERS
GAME SHOWS
BLOOD
HOLY "COW"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Alex: We\'ve got less than a minute to go.)

Don Quixote

Bob
')

toggle('clue_J_1_5', 'clue_J_1_5_stuck', '[The end-of-round signal sounds.]
(Alex: Fly it this way. I\'ve got a lot of friends in Ohio, I\'d better fly it right. That sound means... pardon? [Flips flag around] The other way, this way. Thank you.)

Ohio

Bob
')

Stone, Iron & Bronze

Ron
')

put salt on it (salt or pepper, season it)

')

Moscow')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'This capital some 1500 miles from London has surpassed it as the most populous city in Europe')

tr.td: EUROPE
This capital some 1500 miles from London has surpassed it as the most populous city in Europe
Bob
Ron
Dottie
2nd place: trip to Maui, Hawaii
New champion: $5,001
3rd place: his and her watches from Daniel Mink
Bob
Ron
Dottie

(including 1 DD),
